properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, CS_CATEGORY_NO, COUNT FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, CS_CATEGORY_NO, COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND CS_CATEGORY_NO = 4 ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_HITS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME, MEM_NO FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_HITS DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, CATEGORY_NO, MEM_NO)VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO, REF_ANO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL,2,SEQ_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL,?,?,?,SYSDATE)
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPDATE_DATE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_ANO = 2 AND REF_BNO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HITS = BOARD_HITS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_WRITING = ?, CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COMMENT_NO, CONTENT, BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, GROUP_NUM, COMMENT_DATE, MEM_NO FROM BOARD_COMMENT LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT(COMMENT_NO,CONTENT,BOARD_NO,MEM_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = 21 AND CS_CATEGORY_NO = 4 AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD_COMMENT SET CONTENT = ? WHERE COMMENT_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITING, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_NAME, NICKNAME FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
